event: dental abscess on left inferior 3rd molar
extension of inflammatory signs to anterior cervical region
diffuse thickening of soft tissues with phlegmon and emphysema
abscess extension to submandibular, parapharyngeal, and retrosternal spaces
bulging of the walls of the airway at the base of the tongue
daily bedside drainage of submandibular region
empiric antibiotic therapy with ceftriaxone and metronidazole
extension of vein thrombosis to brachiocephalic vein
persistence of left internal jugular vein thrombosis
completed 24 days of ceftriaxone and metronidazole
